nodes.title: The Freedom Experiment - an LDS Perspective
nodes.excerpt: This article was posted on  Medium . "The Fourth of July means a lot to me, but it did not dawn on me until this morning just how foreign my…
nodes.description: The Fourth of July means a lot to me, but it did not dawn on me until this morning just how foreign my reasons would seem to most people- even my closest (non-Mormon) friends.
